description:
Grobner was an Alliance bureaucrat who had served as director of personnel affairs under the Alliance Department of National Defence. On 19 September 788 UC, he personally conferred to http://anidb.net/ch737 [Yang Wen-li] his promotion to Lt Commander as a result of his successful evacuation of the civilians of El Facil from an Imperial invasion.
Gineipedia
name: Grobner
